articles.description: Semi-automated offside technology will be used in English domestic football for the first time during the fifth round of the FA Cup.
articles.title: FA Cup to use semi-automated offsides for first time

articles.description: What happens now after Arne Slot's red card at Everton?
articles.title: Arne Slot: What happens after Liverpool manager was shown a red card?

articles.description: England "backed guys off a little" because of injuries during their tour of India, says coach Brendon McCullum amid criticism of the team's preparation.
articles.title: England in India: Brendon McCullum says injuries impacted tourists training time amid criticism

articles.description: Arsenal striker Kai Havertz is set to miss the rest of the season with a hamstring injury and may need surgery.
articles.title: Kai Havertz: Arsenal forward set to miss rest of season with hamstring injury

articles.description: Lando Norris says he needs to get his "elbows out" but also be "smart" in his battles with rival Max Verstappen on track this year.
articles.title: McLaren 2025 car: Lando Norris says he needs to be smart to beat Max Verstappen

articles.description: Chelsea boss Sonia Bompastor says Sam Kerr's apology "is enough" and that the club will not be taking any further action following the player's court case.
articles.title: Sam Kerr: Chelsea manager Sonia Bompastor says striker's apology 'enough'

articles.description: Celtic could face Uefa sanctions over a banner displayed by their fans during the Champions League play-off game against Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Champions League: Celtic could face Uefa action over Israel banner

articles.description: Eilish McColgan expects to break  Paula Radcliffe's 22-year-old British record in the London Marathon - but not on her debut.
articles.title: London Marathon 2025: Eilish McColgan on Paula Radcliffe record

articles.description: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca confirms forward Nicolas Jackson has been ruled out for "around six to eight weeks" with a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Nicolas Jackson: Chelsea striker out until international break with injury - Enzo Maresca

articles.description: Liverpool and Everton jointly condemn online racist abuse received by Everton midfielder Abdoulaye Doucoure, while Merseyside Police have opened an investigation.
articles.title: Abdoulaye Doucoure: Police investigate as Everton and Liverpool condemn online racist abuse
